full_text_summary: The bid invitation by LCA Tejas Division, HAL, requests submission of tenders through GeM using a two-bid system, with required compliance to technical specifications provided in various annexures. Bids are favored from Class-I and Class-II local suppliers due to Make in India policies and are subject to essential criteria compliance. Notably, there's a requirement for declaration for content and border-sharing nations with specific document submissions outlined, including technical and commercial bid separation. HAL underscores no agent involvement in tendering, rejecting bids via email or fax, to mitigate against fraudulent claims of representation.
